projects.subheading: Responsive Instagram clone with Real-Time Chat feature
projects.description: I built this Responsive Instagram clone with Real-Time Chat feature all by myself using React and firebase. You can Login or signup, follow or unfollow not only this, they can like and comment on others posts. You can chat with your friends in real time
features: Authentication of the User (using Firebase Authentication)
Personalised feed shows the posts of the users whom you are following.

projects.description: I built this Responsive Swiggy clone with 'VOICE SEARCH' alongwith a team of 4 members in just 4 days using HTML, CSS, JS ans json-server. You can Login or signup, apply different filters and sorting of the products, add or remove items in the cart and place an order. I have contributed in each and every page of it for CSS and for advanced JS implementations like filter, sorting and display products accordingly and voice search.
features: add or remove items in the cart and place an order

projects.subheading: Sorting algorithms can be difficult to understand and it’s easy to get confused. Visualizing sorting algorithms can be a great way to better understand their functioning while having fun.
projects.description: Sorting algorithms can be difficult to understand and it’s easy to get confused. Visualizing sorting algorithms can be a great way to better understand their functioning while having fun.
features: Converting the Sorting logic into the visuals
There is not much to mention Check it on your own

projects.subheading: Sudoku is a very mindful game but visualising it being done prgramatically is a great feeling.
